name: World Word War
description:
World Word War is a short typing race game designed as a tower defense where you will play as a turret defending your town from the enemy. Waves of planes fly towards you and you will have to type the words that appear on them as fast as possible in order to shoot and destroy them. Try and stay alive as long as possible and beat your own highscore!

Credits: 

Programmer: Thomas Jacobs

Designer: Jason Green & Tiurean Stefana

Artist: Ryan Lynch
